{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01493v1", "title": "Shape derivative for the Dirichlet-to-Neumann operator on a manifold and
  application to cellular protrusion", "summary": "We establish a shape-derivative formula for the Dirichlet-to-Neumann operator
on a compact manifold. Then, we apply this formula to obtain the well-posedness
in H 1 under a specific Rayleigh-Taylor condition to an equation describing
cell protrusions. This equation is a generalisation of the theoretical part of
[9] to any -2D as well as 3D-surfaces.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-02T08:46:43Z"}
